dict.acceptation: 婚礼；婚宴；结婚纪念日；结合；
与…结婚；使完婚；使紧密结合；把形式与作用紧密结合的风格；

sent.orig: Tags: Wedding Jewellery, Wedding Accessories, Wedding Tiaras, Bridal Jewellery, Vintage Costume Jewellery, Pearl Jewellery.
sent.trans: 标签：婚礼首饰，结婚用品，结婚皇冠，新娘珠宝，复古服装首饰，珍珠饰品。

sent.orig: Do not know that the wedding actually will be so-called celebrating wedding in bridal chamber frenziedly!
sent.trans: 想不到婚礼竟然会如此的疯狂闹洞房！

sent.orig: Cutting wedding cake is a central part of the wedding reception.
sent.trans: 切婚礼蛋糕是婚宴的重头儿戏。

sent.orig: After wedding ceremony, the wedding feast began.
sent.trans: 婚礼仪式结束，婚宴起头。

sent.orig: Then the wedding march is played and the wedding party enters the church.
sent.trans: 接着奏婚礼进行曲，婚礼队伍进入教堂。
